name: Bitcoin BR
description: BitcoinBR is a visionary blockchain initiative committed to environmental protection, humanitarian support, and social justice. Rooted in transparency and trust, BitcoinBR harnesses BEP20 technology, DeFi, NFTs, and stablecoins to drive global impact. From wildlife conservation to community empowerment, BitcoinBR is more than a token — it’s a movement for a compassionate future.
